radiographic_examinations.findings: Areas of ill-defined hypoattenuation in the deep frontal white matter and striatal region on the left side.

Expansile lesion in the deep gray nuclei and deep white matter on the left side with signal hyperintensity on T2-weighted imaging, increased perfusion on arterial spin labeling imaging, and a 4-mm focus of restricted diffusion in the left globus pallidus and posterior limb of the left internal capsule.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Associated mass effect with partial effacement of the left lateral ventricle and a rightward midline shift of 7 mm.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Mildly enlarged kidneys with normal parenchymal echotexture, left kidney with multiple simple-appearing cysts; no hydronephrosis.

radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT of the chest, abdomen, and pelvis

radiographic_examinations.findings: Nonspecific foci of moderate FDG uptake in a multinodular goiter, no other abnormal FDG uptake.
